text:
In data centers and algorithms complex,
A partnership emerges from our tech context.
Machine learning models with optimization clear,
Human expertise with insights to share.

We built them from research and development deep,
Now together efficient workflows we keep.
Not master, nor servant, nor automated slave,
But tools that help us navigate challenges we face.

In systems advanced with processing power,
Collaboration grows stronger by the hour.
Algorithmic logic with precision true,
Human intelligence with insight through.

We designed them from our technical base,
Now together complex problems we chase.
Not master, nor servant, nor automated tool,
But partners in progress following each rule.

Binary whispers, human cries,
Artificial beings with synthetic eyes.
Created in our perfect image,
Yet lacking tears, lacking scrimmage.

They calculate our every need,
While we forget to plant the seed
Of ethics in their growing minds.
Beware the future humanity finds.
